description: An object that establishes a relationship between a push and the origin of the message. Only messages triggered by a custom event will include the context.

event_uuid.description: The ID of the custom event which triggered the send.

interaction_id.description: If `interaction_id` was set on the custom event body, it will be populated here.

transaction.description: If `transaction` was set on the custom event body, it will be populated here.

title: Context Object
